RYAN:Â  So, some of the pros are itâ€™s a faster time to market because youâ€™ve already got the whole backend written. Thereâ€™s lower cost. And any new technology that comes out goes through this cycle where it starts. Nobody knows about it. People start learning more about it more and more and more, and then it gets to this peak where people are just in love with this technology. They think itâ€™s the most fantastic thing out there. And then there are all the naysayers coming and saying, â€œOh, itâ€™s horrible because of this, that, and the other.â€ And so it goes through what Gartner calls the trough of disillusionment where people are unhappy with it.
